comments.content: @sameer.modha@itv.com this means the term expires the earlier of (i) completion of services; or (ii) 30 June 2026. You might want to look at this clause because it also states that the parties will discuss how to treat any un-usued pre-paid fees at the Expiration Date. This was how Will wanted it drafted last year. Let me know if this has changed.
@sameer.modha@itv.com Have we agreed that pricing models in the Services Agreement (see pages 17/18) will be the fixed prices for any spend above £100,000 until 30 June 2026?

replies.content: No - good shout - tbh it's an unlikely scenario but in the event I'd either want to (a) negotiate a totally different structure or (b) keep them fixed.

comments.content: @sameer.modha@itv.com Have we agreed with Innovid that we will continue on the same pricing models as currently agreed in the Services Agreement (pages 17/18) for the remaining £100,000?

replies.content: Yes - in theory we could change this but it would be a hellscape. It's OK as is.
